title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: I currently hold my Gala on ledger and will just hold on there till the update is released on May 15th when all Gala V1 will be converted to Gala V2. If we fall below $0.025 I will buy a few thousand more and send over to ledger with the rest of the Gala i have as that would be too good a price to miss out on.Wondering what everyone else is doing with their Gala are you holding strong or did you sell?
